hopobject.name: U-Boot (V1)
hopobject.body:
U-Boot V1 source available at
http://code.google.com/p/beagleboard/downloads/list
does work on BeagleBoard. But code quality isn't ready for upstream sending. Goal of this project is to clean up code to make it upstream ready and then push it into mainline U-Boot (V1).
Recent efforts are coordinated through Steve Sakoman's U-Boot git repository:
http://www.sakoman.net/cgi-bin/gitweb.cgi?p=u-boot-omap3.git;a=summary
hopobject.shortdesc: Make U-Boot (V1) upstream ready and integrate it into upstream U-Boot
